name: personal pronouns, Verbs, phrasal verbs শেখাতে হবে:
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: determiner, articles, preposition,
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: times, places, adjectives synonyme, anthonym
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: I eat rice.
negative: I do not eat rice.=>আমি ভাত খাই না।
interrogative: Do I eat rice? =>আমি কি ভাত খাই?
negativeInterrogative: Don't I eat rice?=>আমি কি ভাত খাই না?
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: I drink water.
negative: I do not drink water.=>আমি পানি পান করি না।
interrogative: Do I drink water? =>আমি কি পানি পান করি?
negativeInterrogative: Don't I drink water?=>আমি কি পানি পান করি না?
WHQuestions: Who drink water?=>কে পানি পান করে?
explanation: I = Subject, drink=transitive verb, water=object. water একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: I play football.
negative: I do not play football.=>আমি ফুটবল খেলি না।
interrogative: Do I play football? =>আমি কি ফুটবল খেলি?
negativeInterrogative: Don't I play football?=>আমি কি ফুটবল খেলি না?

name: Supposing that I go there but what will it benefit you?
meaning: ধর আমি সেখানে গেলাম, কিন্তু তাতে তোমার লাভ কী হবে?

name: A dog does not bite unless it is teased
meaning: জ্বালাতন না করা হলে কুকুর কামড়ায় না।

name: That he is a good teacher is known to all.
meaning: তিনি যে একজন ভাল শিক্ষক তা সবার জানা।

name: The news that he had an accident is true.
meaning: সে দুর্ঘটনায় পড়েছিল এ কথা সত্য।

name: When the sun touches the mountaintops with its golden light, the shadows on the slopes of the hill become entangled and dense.
meaning: যখন রোদ সোনালি আলোয় সূর্য পাহাড়ের শীর্ষ স্পর্শ করে, তখনই পাহাড়ের ঢালুতে ছায়া গুমোট হয়ে ঢাকা পড়ে যায়।??

name: Even though the branches of a tree tremble and break under the fury of the storm, its roots still cling firmly to the ground.
meaning: যদিও ঝড়ের থাবায় গাছ কাঁপে ও ডাল ভাঙে, তবুও তার শেকড় মজবুতভাবে মাটির সাথে জড়িয়ে থাকে।

name: The words had descended into the deep abyss of her mind, where waves of memory lapped and the tide of emotion rose.
meaning: কথাগুলো তার মনের গভীর অতলে নেমে গিয়েছিল, যেখানে স্মৃতির তরঙ্গ লেগেছিল, আর অনুভূতির জোয়ার এসেছিল।।

name: For those who cherish dreams and hold onto hope, the windows of wonder open in their lives.
meaning: যারা স্বপ্নকে লালন করে ও প্রত্যাশাকে ধরে রাখে, তাদেরই জীবনে আশ্চর্যের জানালা খুলে যায়।

name: When the venomous clouds of war darken the city's sky, only the rain of sorrow falls on the innocent hearts.
meaning: যুদ্ধের বিষাক্ত মেঘ যখন শহরের আকাশ আঁধার করে, তখন নিরীহ মানুষের অন্তরে শুধু দুঃখের বৃষ্টি নামে।

name: While dust flies on the village paths and the air is filled with the fragrance of crops, the heart of the city holds only the silence of concrete.
meaning: যদিও গ্রামের পথে ধুলা উড়ে, ফসলের সুবাসে বাতাস ভরে, কিন্তু শহরের হৃদয়ে শুধু কংক্রিটের নীরবতা।

name: Even when the light of the sunset fades, the twinkling stars write a new story in the night sky.
meaning: সূর্যাস্তের আলো চলে গেলেও, তারার ঝলমলে আলো রাতের আকাশে এক নতুন গল্প লিখে।

name: Even though many obstacles come in the path of life, it is through continuous effort and struggle that one can reach the pinnacle of success.
meaning: যদিও জীবনের পথে অনেক বাঁধা আসে, কিন্তু অবিরাম চেষ্টা আর লড়া ইয়ের মাধ্যমেই সাফল্যের শিখরে পৌঁছানো যায়।

name: In the rhyme of songs woven with the thread of tradition, generations have mingled, telling new stories.
meaning: ঐতহ্যের সুতোয় বোনা গানের তালে, প্রজন্মের পর প্রজন্ম মিশে গিয়েছে, নতুন গল্প বলেছে।

name: When the curtain of sleep descends on the eyelids, the mind wanders in the kingdom of dreams, traveling to unknown lands.
meaning: যখন চোখের পাতায় ঘুমের পর্দা নামে, তখন স্বপ্নের রাজ্যে মন বিচরণ করে, অচেনা দেশে ভ্রমণ করে।

name: He is poor but honest.
Study hard or you will fail.
meaning: কঠোর লেখাপড়া কর নইলে ফেল করবে।

name: Study hard otherwise you will fail.
meaning: কঠোর লেখাপড়া কর নইলে ফেল করবে।

name: His father is an honest man while he is a thief.
meaning: তার বাবা একজন সৎ লোক যেখানে সে একজন চোর।

name: You must do it or you will be in a danger.
meaning: তুমি অবশ্যই এটি করবে অন্যথায় তুমি বিপদে পড়বে।

name: I want to have tea, give me sugar.
meaning: আমি চা খেতে চাই, আমাকে চিনি দিও।

name: I am going to spend the weekend just relaxing.
meaning: আমি এই উইকেন্ড শুধু রিলাক্স করে কাটাতে যাচ্ছি।

name: I am going to drive and then take the train.
meaning: আমি গাড়ি চালিয়ে পর ট্রেন ধরতে যাচ্ছি।

name: He is telling a downright lie.
It is not only wrong, but a downright lie.
meaning: এটি শুধু ভুলই নয়, ডাহা মিথ্যা।

name: I am going to have another cup of coffee.
meaning: আমি আরেক কাপ কফি পান করতে যাচ্ছি।

name: I am going to take a shower.
I am going for a beer/dinner with David tonight.
meaning: আমি আজ রাতে ডেভিডের সাথে ডিনার নিতে যাচ্ছি।

name: I am having trouble.
It is raining.
It is dewing.
It is snowing.
Raman is playing right now.
I am going to bed now.
The water is boiling.
I'm living with some friends until I find a flat.
meaning: আম একটি ফ্ল্যাট খুঁজে না পাওয়া পর্যন্ত কিছু বন্ধুর সাথে থাকছি।???

name: You're working hard today.
I'm always losing things.
It's spitting.
It's drizzling.
It's raining.
It's pouring.
It's lashing.
It's bucketing down.
It's raining cats and dogs.
He is coming soon.
I am going to Dhaka soon.
I am buying a mobile soon.
I am changing my room soon.
meaning: আমি শীঘ্রই আমার রুম পরিবর্তন করছি।

name: I have seen him from a distance.
I've finished my homework.

he hated spinach.

She has been singing a song.???
We have been working for two hours.
He has been saving money.??
He stumbled at every step.
The river was full to the brim.
Max always wanted to travel to Europe.
meaning: ম্যাক্স সবসময়ই ইউরোপে ভ্রমণ করতে চেয়েছিলেন।
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: Could you please open the door?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি দরজাটি খুলে দিতে পারবে?

name: Could you please sent the message?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি বার্তাটি পৌঁছাতে পারবে?

name: Could you please tell the truth?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি সত্য কথাটি বলবে?

name: Could you please write an application?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি একটি দরখাস্ত লিখবে?

name: Could you please read the book?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি দরজাটি খুলে দিতে পারবে?

name: Could you please take the responsibility?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি দায়িত্বটি গ্রহণ করবে?

name: Could you please wait for a moment?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি েএক মুহুর্তের জন্য অপেক্ষা করবে?

name: Could you please close the door?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি দরজাটা বন্ধ করবে?

name: Could you please turn the volume down?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি ভলিউমটা কমাবে?

name: Could you please give me that book?.
meaning: দয়া করে তুমি কি বইটা দিবে?

name: He was greedy.
He was drunk.
He was emotional.
He was honest.
He was fearless.
He was timid.
He was generous.
He was stingy
He was gabby.
He was handsome.
He was ignorant.
He was throughless.
The baby came to it's mother dancing.
meaning: শিশুটি নেচে নেচে তার মায়ের কাছে আসল।

name: He heard me singing.
I saw him running.
Having gone to market, he bought a pen.
meaning: বাজারে গিয়ে সে একটি কলম কিনল।

name: I called him yesterday.
Bulbul made this toy the day before yesterday.
meaning: বুলবুল গত পরশু এই খেলনাটি তৈরি করেছিল।

name: As I was ill I could not go to school.
meaning: যেহেতু আমি অসুস্থ সেহেতু আমি স্কুলে যেতে পারিনি।

name: Since I was ill I could not attend the meeting.
meaning: যেহেতু আমি অসুস্থ সেহেতু আমি সভায় যোগ দিতে পারিনি।

name: He asked me if I would go with him.
meaning: আমি তার সাথে যাব কিনা সে আমার কাছে জানতে চাইল।

name: We could not go there because the weather was bad
meaning: আমরা সেখানে যেতে পারিনি করাণ, আবহাওয়া ছিল মন্দ।

name: Not only Rahim but also Karim went there.
meaning: শুধু করিম নয় রহিমও সেখানে গিয়েছিল।

name: The man had no money; nevertheless he wanted to buy the shirt.
meaning: লোকটির কোন অর্থ ছিল না, অন্যথায়/নাহলে সে শার্টটি কিনতে চেয়েছিল।

name: He came to me and discussed the matter.
meaning: তুমি অবশ্যই এটি করবে অন্যথায় তুমি বিপদে পড়বে।

name: I came, I saw and I conquered.
meaning: আমি আসলাম, দেখলাম এবং জয় করলাম।

name: I thought, thought and thought.
He came to our house, ate rice, gossipped for some time and went away.
meaning: সে আমাদের বাড়ীতে আসল, ভাত খেল, কিছু সময় গল্প করল এবং চলে গেল।

name: The winding mountain path tested my endurance, but the breathtaking view from the summit was mine alone. I stretched my arms wide, feeling the wind dance through my hair, a conqueror of my own fears.
meaning: পর্বতের ঘন সরু পথ আমার সহ্যশক্তির পরীক্ষা করেছিল, কিন্তু চূড়া থেকে মনোমোহনাকর দৃশ্য ছিল শুধু আমারই। আমি হাত খুলে বাড়িয়ে দিলাম, আমার চুলে বাতাসের নাচন অনুভব করলাম, আমার নিজের ভয়ের বিজয়ী।
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: 'Believe in yourself,'I whispered, staring into the bathroom mirror. My eyes, tired but determined, met mine. Today, I choose me. My dreams, my aspirations, my failures and triumphs - they are all mine to chase, to own, to live.
meaning: ”নিজেকে বিশ্বাস করো,” আমি ফিসফিস করে বললাম, বাথরুমে আয়নায় তাকিয়ে। আমার চোখ ক্লান্ত কিন্তু দৃঢ়, আমার সাথে দেখা হল। আজ আমি নিজেকে বেছে নিচ্ছি। আমার স্বপ্ন, আমার আকাঙ্খা, আমার ব্যর্থতা এবং বিজয় -সেগুলো সবই আমারই, ধাওয়া/তাড়া করার, মালিক হওয়ার, বাঁচার জন্য।
explanation: I=Subject, eat=transitive verb, v1, rice=object. rice একটি uncountable noun হওয়ায় এর পূর্বে কোন article ব্যবহৃত হয়নি।

name: She was studying for her exam all night.
It was getting late, so he went home.
meaning: দেরী হয়ে যাচ্ছিল, তাই সে বাড়ী চলে গিয়েছিল।

name: Sumona was cooking last night.
She was studying for her exam all night.
meaning: সে সারারাত তার পরীক্ষার জন্য পড়ছিল।

name: They were playing soccer when it started raining.
meaning: যখন বৃষ্টি শুরু হয়েছিল তখন সে সকার খেলছিল।

name: We were having dinner at a restaurant when the power were out.
meaning: যখন বিদ্যুৎ চলে গিয়েছিল তখন আমরা রেস্টুরেন্টে রাতের খাবার খাচ্ছিলাম।

name: He was working on a project late into the night.
meaning: সে গভীর রাত পর্যন্ত একটি প্রজেক্টে কাজ করছিল।

name: The children were laughing and playing in the park.
I was watching a movie when I received the phone call.
meaning: আমি যখন ফোনটি পেয়েছিলাম তখন আমি খেলছিলাম।

name: The team was practicing when it started to thunderstorm.
meaning: টিম প্রাকটিস করার সময় বজ্রবৃষ্টি শুরু হয়েছিল।

name: It was snowing heavily yesterday afternoon.
The teacher was explaining a difficult concept to the students.
meaning: শিক্ষক ছাত্রদের একটি কঠিন কনসেপ্ট ব্যাখ্যা করছিলেন।

name: My friend was travelling/traveling?? in Europe last summer.
meaning: গত গ্রীষ্মে আমার বন্ধু ইউরোপে ভ্রমণ করছিল।

name: I had already eaten dinner when she arrived.
She had finished her work before the meeting started.
We had visited that museum before it closed down.
They had studied for the test, so they felt prepared.
He had already left by the time I arrived at the party.
The train had departed before we reached the station.
I realized I had forgotten my keys when I got home.
She had read the book before watching the movie adaptation.
We had lived in that city for five years before moving.

They were playing soccer when it started raining.

The teacher was explaining a difficult concept to the students.

Saleem had already posted the letter..
When I reached the house, the rain had stopped.
I had never seen such a lion before.
You had gone before I came.
I had been studying for three hours before I finally took a break.
meaning: অবশেষে একটি বিরতি নেওয়ার পূর্বে আমি তিন ঘন্টা ধরে পড়ছিলাম।

name: She had been working at the company for five years.
meaning: সে কোম্পানীতে পাঁচ বছর ধরে কাজ করছিল।

name: They had been waiting in line for hours when the concert was cancelled.
meaning: যখন কনসার্ট ক্যানসেল হয়েছিল তখন তারা ঘন্টার পর ঘন্টা লাইনে অপেক্ষা করছিল।

name: We had been living in that neighbourhood for a decade.
The team had been practising tirelessly before the championship game.
We had been jogging every morning for a month before he injured his ankle.
By the time I arrived, they had been arguing for hours.
She had been saving money for months to buy a new car.
They had been dating for two years before they got engaged.
Anna had been trying to repair her car.
Had he been reading a newspaper?
He had been doing a job at a young age.
He had been laughing too much in the classroom.
he had been studying since morning.
I had been listening to music.
I had been working hard all day.
My mom had not been combing hair.
'She had been running for half an hour.
She had been singing for ten years.
The crow had been flying in the sky.
The elephant had been eating a lot food.
I will be by you.
I will stay home.
I will come to your house tomorrow.
I will dine out.
That will be great.
That will be very nice.
I will learn.
I will read later.
I will stay home if it rains.
meaning: যদি বৃষ্টি হয় তাহলে আমি বাড়ীতে থাকব/অবস্থান করব।

name: If it rains, I will stay home .
meaning: যদি বৃষ্টি হয় তাহলে আমি বাড়ীতে থাকব/অবস্থান করব।

name: I will go if he comes.
They will eat and drink.
My father will go to Californina.
He will become a good person.
We shall go to school along.
You will remember our whole life.
John will play football tomorrow.
My mother will cook delicious food.
Dona will buy a new mobile next month.
They will sleep in the afternoon.
Next year, I will live in London.
I will return her book.
We will win the match today.
Tomorrow, we shall go to the barber.
They will stay outside.
She will come to the party.
Lots of people will go on vacation this summer.
It will be raining tomorrow.
What will you be doing at 10pm tonight.
You will have to come.
Maria speaks five languages.
We never go to the cinema.
I don't like to wash the car.
meaning: আমি গাড়ী ধুতে পছন্দ করি না।

name: Jenny always wears nice clothes.
You don't work very hard.
meaning: তুমি খুব বেশি কঠিন কাজ কর না।

name: They play football on Sundays.
Does he speak English?
She goes everywhere by bicycle.
James always goes to work by car.
Mary often loses her keys/toys.
We have been waiting for the bus for a long time.
meaning: আমরা দীর্ঘ সময় ধরে বাসের জন্য অপেক্ষা করছি।

name: They will be celebrating their anniversary at a fancy restaurant.
The children will be playing in the park all afternoon.
I will be working at 9 am.
He will be using the car.
She will be eating food at 8pm.
We will be having dinner when the film starts.
Will they be watching tv?.
He will pay back the money by installments.
meaning: সে কিস্তিতে কিস্তিতে টাকা ফেরত দেবে।

name: I have sent basketfull of fruits for you.
I will be studying for my exams tomorrow evening.
They will be travelling to Paris next month.
She will be working on her project all day.
We will be attending the conference next week.
He will be practising the piano for two hours tonight.
The team will be preparing for the match the whole week.
The construction workers will be building the new bridge troughout the summer.
By this time tomorrow, I'll be flying to London.
He will have written a letter.
The farmer will have ploughed the fields.
He will not have finished the work by now.
You will not have tried to win the prize.
He will not have reached the college till now.
I have been studying for three hours.
meaning: আমি তিন ঘন্টা ধরে স্টাডি করছি/অধ্যয়ন করছি।

name: She has been working on that project since morning.
meaning: সে সেই প্রজেক্টে/প্রকল্পে সকাল হতে কাজ করছে।

name: They have been playing tennis all afternoon.
meaning: তারা সারা বিকাল ধরে টেনিস খেলছে।

name: He has been jogging every morning for a month.
meaning: যে এক মাস ধরে প্রতিদিন সকালে জগিং করছে।

name: I have a good news for you.
meaning: I have good news for you.?

name: He is Daniel in judgement.
meaning: He is a Daniel in judgement

name: It was tough decision to make.
meaning: It was a tough decision to make.

name: A little spark kindles great fire.
meaning: A little spark kindles a great fire.

name: The clock has struck seven hours
It's not good to go to the bed late.
meaning: It's not good to go to bed late.

name: We came by the 4:30 o'clock train.
Worry kills more the man than work.
meaning: Worry kills more men than work.

name: We cannot set a foot in this house. ??
meaning: We cannot set foot in this house.

name: He left with his belonging luggage.
He sent a word that he would come.
meaning: He sent word that he would come.

name: We learn not at the school, but in life.
meaning: We learn not at school, but in life.

name: I have read the Shakespeare's King Lear.
meaning: I have read Shakespeare's King Lear.
